english: I am going to the village tomorrow.
notes: me=I, savar=tomorrow, taanden=to village, jaayevalo chu = will be going

english: Can you give me some water?
notes: mann-me, channik-some, paani-water, dechi ge - can you give
aaj-today, bus-bus, deer eeti - will be late, aaveche-come.
mann-i, sabji-vegetables, leer che- want to take
mann-me, aant-hear, aai koni - cant / did not
suraj-sun, ghano-very, taato che- is hot

english: Cows are grazing in the field.
notes: gavdi-cows, kheteermai- inside field, khad-grass, khareeche- are eating
